Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17362 affecting package libtomcrypt for versions less than 1.18.2-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-17362 affecting package libtomcrypt for versions less than 1.18.2-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libtomcrypt is earlier than 1.18.2-9, affected by CVE-2019-17362
